website_summaries.verdict: Boasts equal or better quality compared to others we reviewed at a great price.
pros: Mat and pillow set with acupressure points for therapy and relief
cons: The pillow doesn't seem as contoured as those in similar sets

customer_reviews.title: so far it's better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Just received the mat & pillow yesterday. I've had acupuncture, which helped but was only short term relief. I didn't know spect too much from this little pad with plastic spikes. :-) Pleasant surprise—so far it's much better than I expected! I used it for ~10 minutes with a cotton cloth between the pad and my skin. The discomfort was minimal and the big 'crick' in my back that woke me in the early hours of the morning was 90% better. The effect lasted for almost 3 hrs. FYI, I'm a chronic pain sufferer, so anything that provides relief is rare. I'm looking forward to trying it throughout the day to see how well the effect lasts.
customer_reviews.author: FLprof

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Eases muscle soreness or pain. I love standing on it the most although it’s a bit intense. Wonderful for the price too! I researched these quite a bit before purchasing and the prices ranged pretty drastically. I decided the try this one due to the good reviews and low price and I was not disappointed. Kids like it too. Oh and the cat. 🤦🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An experienced user could not handle it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom who is an experienced acupuncture mat user and she absolutely hated this product, couldn’t use it a single time. She said that the mat she normally uses(she sleeps on one every night) has longer stronger needles that are spaced closer together and her mat is smaller so it only provides pressure one area at a time which is a lot easier to handle. So I would not recommend this product for a beginner for sure! A cheap product like this one is not suitable for acupuncture, a very delicate matter!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I no longer need to get cupped. That being said they can use memory foam instead the cheap stuff and they can make this in the US instead off outsourcing for cheaper labor. Other than that find a better vendor to sell through. I don't believe in Amazon's business practices or the way they treat their employees.
customer_reviews.author: know where you buy from

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Accupressure mat & neck pillow
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this item set. Upon first use I intended to lay on it for the recommended 30 minutes but it induced such relaxation, that I fell asleep almost instantly! The pressure is just right & the placement of the many spines makes it easy to access any area of the body to relieve pain & muscle tension, which I suffer with daily! The foam is soft but so supportive that it does not lose its shape even after sleeping on it all night (which has happened) It is sooo relaxing. It is my go-to device for natural pain relief & to help in relaxing tight, locked or hurting muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal DeMedeiros

customer_reviews.title: Best product I've bought for my chronic pain
customer_reviews.text: I have spent a lot of money on products to help my chronic osteoarthritis pain in my neck and back. This "pokey pad" as we call it, has worked wonders on my pain. I also have degenerative disk disease, scoliosis and stenosis and more going on neck to hips. I'm an active person and when I start to hurt, I lie down on the back pad and neck roll for 5-15 minutes and feel so much better when I get up. I have even fallen asleep on it when I intended to stay only 15 minutes. I recommend it highly and have been telling all my friends about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jil Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly works well
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical at first. I’ve had it for over a year and didn’t think it would do anything. It has cleared up my headaches and back pain very quickly. I left work earlier today with a migraine and a sore back, came home and used this. Fell asleep now feel a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Goodstuff

customer_reviews.title: Increases circulation
customer_reviews.text: Interesting product, very innovative, it does increase circulation and relieve pain, I would buy this again I have upper back pain and it is very difficult to treat, even with massage, when I use this mat it releaves the pain, it is uncomfortable to lie on at times but the discomfort is worth the 'getting used to it' time.
customer_reviews.author: eddie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely try this. For pain, anxiety, tension, depression. Its worth a shot!
customer_reviews.text: Ok im obsessed So glad i listened to the reviews. Im currently laying on it now the second time today. Arrived in less than 24 hours. I can't believe how effective it is in pain relief, relaxation and overall mood/ energy. Just like it says!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael uecke

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the positive reviews I decided to order this back & neck pain relief pad. I layed on it with a lightweight nightgown at 1st then layed on it w/o clothes to see if I could get any better results. I have suffered with sciatica & low back pain for years & was hoping this would help. It claimed it was like acupuncture (which I've had with limited succes). Unfortunately so far no lasting results have happened. It actually feels good when I lay on it in the moment. But afterwards I don't see or feel any real difference so far. I will keep giving it a try to see if any improvement develops. Keeping my fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: sherry shelton

customer_reviews.title: My nighttime “me time”!
customer_reviews.text: I love laying on this at the end of the day! I know that it will get the blood flowing to the knots and the tension held in my muscles. It’s the perfect relaxation tool. My advice: build up your tolerance. It will hurt just a little at first, but by day three, it’ll begin to feel good right away.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Ziemianski

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I just started using it and I am pleasantly surprised at how my back pain has eased. As I said I just began using it and I haven’t used it on other parts of the body but for my back it has been amazing ! I use it before my workout in the morning and I find a remarkable difference... Not able to explain it but especially for the back usage, all the pressure points does something in the system! You have a whole sense of well being!
customer_reviews.author: A in LA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and superior product for the price. Most mats cost $10-$20 more. I recommend acupressure mats to all my massage clients for pain relief and relaxation. I myself sit on one while doing desk tasks and lay on one almost every night.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I don’t feel it works.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I loved my Spoonk mat so much. I needed and extra one for our vacation home. When you lay on the spoonk mat , you need a minute to adjust to the spikes before it becomes comfortable. On this one, you just lay right down and feel nothing. It doesn’t seem to be doing much.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia ryan

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to write reviews but my husband and I love this thing. He uses a foam roller but still has back pain. Due to an injury, I am afraid to use the foam roller on my lower back. Laying on this thing for 10 mins even with a dress on relieved back pain for me that no massage could have helped. I've only tried it once on my lower back without clothes and geeze... it that kind of thing that hurts so bad it feels good. Definitely happy we got it.
customer_reviews.author: cassie mccauley

customer_reviews.title: So like I said I want on use it more to ...
customer_reviews.text: Stil testing it out to give it a full 5 star review - but there seem to be a lot of benefits so far. Helps me relax and take tension off of my neck - but that feeling doesn't seem to last long after I'm off of the mat. So like I said I want on use it more to give it a better review.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Puetz

customer_reviews.title: Who needs a prana mat?
customer_reviews.text: Not that I have any idea what the quality of a Prana Mat is like but I can say that I love my accupressure mat. I've almost fallen asleep on this thing. I have back issues and it really helps on those days where I feel too stiff, annoying soreness/pain, or even when I have menstrual pain. Loved it so much, I bought one for my sister. She had the disks in her back replaced YEARS ago and she uses it frequently (especially during the colder times of the year). The pillow is a great addition too. If I have neck pain or feel a tension headache coming on then I use the pillow and poof! the headache/soreness is gone!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing, and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I’ve used it 3 times so far, 20 minutes per time, and it is amazing! Brings circulation to the back and neck, stimulates sore muscle, breaks up fascia, and energizes the whole body. I also stood on it for 10 minutes...intense, but helpful. Also, same exact thing as the Shakti mat, but for 1/3 of the price. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: Guinness77

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: I recently started writing reviews and i want to write something for this item as well - i have been using it for some time now. The value is good for the product, the quality is decent as well. Pain relieving wise, didn't help me much. I have neck and back pain but it didn’t help me much. Its too sharp if you lay bare on it, it hurts.. i would recommend putting a thin cloth over it. Hope it helps you.
customer_reviews.author: Ladu Birla

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price !
customer_reviews.text: This product works well and is very relaxing after a few minutes. I use for my lower back pain and neck pain and have a notice a difference. I try and do 20 minutes every other day or when i feel i need it the most. You cant beat the price of this product either.
customer_reviews.author: SabbyBar87

customer_reviews.title: Works well for muscle tension
customer_reviews.text: This product is helpful if you hold your muscles too tightly / hold tension in your muscles. The pinpoint pressure over a broad surface helps your muscles to relax. I do have chronic pain issues due to a variety of reasons but when it is due to muscle tension this product helps with that. I use it after exercising to help my body relax again.
customer_reviews.author: Kaila Loff

customer_reviews.title: It's no Bed of Nails, but it'll do.
customer_reviews.text: It's a fine mat, well made, does the job, and seems like the best buy at this price point. The pillow is a good size and sturdy foam. My one real complaint is that the plastic prongs feel a bit sharper than the OG bed of nails mat I was introduced to. I'm unable to lay on this just my bare back, as it's uncomfortable and unbearable before you get to the good part. I had an easier time waiting out the initial discomfort on the BoN mat and find the sharpness of these to be distracting without a thin tshirt between.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Low quality cheap product
customer_reviews.text: This is a classical Chinese very cheap, useless, overpriced product. The idea is good but the product is useless, because the spikes on the back mat, which BTW is so small it looks as if made for children, are too short to feel anything. You are supposed to roll on it but it's way too small. Idea good, but mindless design ...
customer_reviews.author: dhalia

customer_reviews.title: You need this product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!! I have slept better in the last 3 days than I have in months!!
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Only liked neck part
customer_reviews.text: I like the part for the neck. The back part feels relaxing laying on it but when i stood up my back was hurting. Did nothing to help my back. The neck pillow i felt helped but thats it.
customer_reviews.author: xanadu228

customer_reviews.title: I have had a similar mat before and this one is as good as the previous one
customer_reviews.text: This product totally met my expectations. I have had a similar mat before and this one is as good as the previous one, but at more affordable price. I feel more energized and all minor tensions in my body are gone every time I spend 40 minutes on this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Martinika.L

customer_reviews.title: A gift from the gods
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaver for someone with chronic pain, inflammation, circulation problems, fatigue, etc. Before I put on my shoes and rush to work, I stand on it for a few minutes, and I'm good to go. If you're sick and stuffed up, the neck pillow will get things going as well. This is something that no massage can provide. Accidentally bought two, and gave one to a friend with chronic migraines, who is now doing much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Crustomer

customer_reviews.title: ... and after standing on this mat he feels much better.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has numbness on his foot and after standing on this mat he feels much better.
customer_reviews.author: Oceanic six

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion, effective for acupressure treatment
customer_reviews.text: At first sight I was skeptical. To the touch with my hand the quarter sized acupressure circles were too sharp. However when I laid on it the first time wearing a thin t-shirt it was amazingly invigorating! Today was the third time to use it and I am still impressed. My Chiropractor said he thought it should be on the bottom of a golf shoe instead 🤣 But I will continue using it, eventually without a t-shirt, as suggested in the information sheet provided. I am glad that I tried it.
customer_reviews.author: Connie E.

customer_reviews.title: drink wa wa after
customer_reviews.text: There's so many products like this out there and I think I just chose the cheapest one and it works like magick. I can't imagine there being significant differences between this and mats priced 10x. Use it on your back, hips, face, feet, stomach and dick/genitalia (with immense focus and caution, and underwear). I would avoid any clothing and just accept life is pain until it isn't. Also drink water soon after to flush some toxins and have been released.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hurts like a mother, but makes me feel relaxed
customer_reviews.text: Not gonna lie, this thing does NOT feel good to lie on. For the first few minutes it hurts pretty badly. The pain does seem to lessen after a while, but never fully goes away. However after about 20 minutes I start to feel tingly and warm all over and it makes me feel super relaxed. Not sure yet how much it has really helped.. I need to use it more often than I do, but dannnnng it hurts!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Sard

customer_reviews.title: EVERYONE should own one!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this mat! Some might find laying on a bed of spikes to be a little crazy, but let me tell you, its extremely relaxing. The first time I used the mat it hurt for the first couple minutes and I thought I wouldn't use it again, but then the pain went away and my body felt relaxed and so much better. I stayed on the mat for roughly 10-15 minutes me first time; when I got off my i felt like my muscles were less tense and over all i felt better! I highly recommend this product, especially if you suffer from back/neck pain!
customer_reviews.author: ELL

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, easy to use, instant pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have systemic rheumatoid arthritis, and have been using this mat for overall pain relief. First night I had it I was on it for maybe 45 minutes and almost fell asleep! It is really intense when laying down, but then after it kind of feels like when you are getting a tattoo, you just go numb. My body feels calm and my mind is calm when I use it. My mood is instantly better, and it works way better for muscles and stiffness than a foam roller. Love. This. Thing. Its amaze-balls.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Great product.. Many different ways to use it.
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful. I have neuropathy and it stimulates the areas that are affected. I have terrible lower back pain and sciatic nerve pain. I lay on this may for 10-15 minutes and feel so much relief. The neck pillow is wonderful for my feet to stimulate circulation. I lie on the mat on my bed, bend my knees and place the neck pillow flat on the bed and put my feet on it. It feels wonderful and it stimulates feeling in my feet and my pain is significantly reduced.
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA

customer_reviews.title: I was leery but this had good reviews. hurts when you first get use to ...
customer_reviews.text: I was leery but this had good reviews. hurts when you first get use to it but actually helped with back and hip pain. Product just as promised and delivered very quickly. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat. It has become very useful since I am unable to see my acupuncturist because of covid19. I lay on the mat for 20 mins and my back and neck pain are almost completely gone.
customer_reviews.author: Annie L.

customer_reviews.title: MAKES ME FALL ASLEEP
customer_reviews.text: I KNOW, SAYING THAT SOMETHING THAT FEELS LIKE A THOUSAND NEEDLES DIGGING INTO YOU SKIN MAKES YOU FALL ASLEEP SOUNDS INSANE...BUT IT DOES. I LOVE THE MAT AND PILLOW. EASES SINUS HEADACHES, SORE MUSCLES AND IS SO RELAXING. WOULD RECOMMEND TO ANY AND EVERYONE. MINE WAS A CHRISTMAS GIFT AND I HAVE USED IT EVERY DAY AND HAVE SLEPT ON IT AT NIGHT IN MY BED.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey G.

customer_reviews.title: Way worth it- Jenna
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed!! I wish this was sharper?! I was like “oooooh no thanks” the first time I used it and now I use it next to bare skin for like 30 minutes at a time and have fallen asleep on it. I LOVE IT. I wish I had 3 more of the lil neck pillows omg...honestly...I never write reviews but this is *chefs kiss*!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Mast

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and arrives exactly as pictured & described!
customer_reviews.text: This product was better than expected. Excellent quality. I was hesitant to spend triple the amount on a name brand version and am so happy I didn’t. We love it. It feels amazing. I was having pain in my joints and this took it away within 20min. It’s extremely relaxing on a meditative level. The customer service was excellent and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Scarletta

customer_reviews.title: It's inexpensive and it works!
customer_reviews.text: I had corrective scoliosis surgery a few years back so I wasnt sure how well this was going to work for me given my spine still has some curvature along with the metal and slight loss of feeling in my back but after about 20 minutes my back felt like jelly, I had less restrictions moving and bending and felt a slight increase in flexibility. The pillow took some getting used to and I dont feel like it's as ergonomic as it should be but still did a wonderful job loosening tight neck muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Kody Sims

customer_reviews.title: Provides pain and stress relief, helps with sleep
customer_reviews.text: I have fibromyalgia and purchased this product to help with pain, stiffness, and stress relief; it helps with all of those things. The first night I used it I slept better and more soundly than I have in months. It’s definitely uncomfortable to use, at least initially, and takes some getting used to but is well worth it, and well worth the price. Definitely something I will add to my regular pain relief arsenal and it may help me save money by cutting down on the number of chiropractic and accupuncture appointments I need. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jschock

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and relieved back pain.
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely works best when you are just wearing a sports bra or shirtless if you can manage it definitely works best. I tried using it with a light tshirt on and I could barely feel it. It’s very relaxing once you’ve positioned yourself properly on it. I would imagine it works best with a consistent regimen. I have purchased this as a gift and it went over great. Highly recommend for someone with lower to mid back pain. I look forward to using this product when I get home.
customer_reviews.author: Synnova B

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprising
customer_reviews.text: The first time i used this my back was sore, and sore from the deep inside where no matter what you did, it still hurt. After 15 minute on this thing, the pain was gone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical at first but after using it I absolutely love this mat. Helps the my back/nack/hip pains. It's not a permanent fix but you will definitely feel the difference. I could fall asleep on it once I relax.
customer_reviews.author: Alise

customer_reviews.title: Feels great. Doesn't really hurt (although I do tend to ...
customer_reviews.text: Feels great. Doesn't really hurt (although I do tend to poke myself when I'm trying to dismount) and like others say, my back starts to feel warm after a while in a pleasant, interesting way. It's hard to say, but I do feel like I sleep deeply after using it. I like to sit on the couch with just the neck pillow too, which is a much less intense experience.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: great sleep aid
customer_reviews.text: so relaxing,! I fall asleep very quickly on this. The only downside is that an hour or two into sleep ill have to pull it out from under me but I usually go right back to sleep. I would definitely recommend this for sleep and relaxation
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Well for Neck, Shoulders and Back
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to one of my girlfriends who had a constant pain in her neck, shoulder and back area. She uses it off and on when the pain gets really bad and it works well for her. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Fan

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the product for about a week, but I notice that if I use it for about a half hour before bed that I am sleeping much better. I agree with the other comments that it works best with your skin touching the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Cher Stutzman

customer_reviews.title: It's working.
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses it almost daily. Helps with her neck pain and back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels better than you think
customer_reviews.text: The whole family loves this. I can’t really imagine that the pricier versions do a better job than this one. I think it’s the best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This definitely relieves some pain and forces you to relax, is it life changing? maybe not but it's helpful to have around for anyone with back pain or who carries their stress in their upper body.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neutral
customer_reviews.text: This may be a waste of money. I don't know. Not sure if it's helped or not with my back and neck issues. I may also need more help than this little mat can provide...
customer_reviews.author: SingleClutchMom

customer_reviews.title: Scary looking but feels great
customer_reviews.text: This sat in it’s box for a month because it’s scary as hell. Finally grew a pair and tried it for ten minutes and I’ll be damned if it wasn’t great. About 4 minutes in the discomfort of laying in golf cleats turns to warming, circulating relaxation. Highly recommend for back pain, nerve pain etc.
customer_reviews.author: Luciano Marcolongo

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: My chiropractor recommended I purchase one of these. I just started using it so it's too soon to tell how effective it is, however, it seems like it's good quality. I love the pillow - that feels great. I definitely feel more relaxed after laying on it.
customer_reviews.author: Andi Locke Mears

customer_reviews.title: I love this. I have a bad back (two herniated ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I have a bad back (two herniated discs), this really does help! it also does a great job de-stressing me. easy to get used to, does not feel painful and is very relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: I saw this and thought it might help with my pain tried it was uncomfortable and didn't do a thing for my pain don't recommend it
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Good tool
customer_reviews.text: Not a magic solution but a good tool. Took a few days to be able to lay on it without a shirt and even then it took a lot of will power to do so during the first 5min but then you get used to it and it has definitely helped release some tightness in my back.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Krier

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this daily and the health benefits have been great. I meditate on it and almost always calms my mind. Use it in the morning and evening before bed. The quality is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Jurkowski

customer_reviews.title: It is worth the try
customer_reviews.text: I’m a chronic back pain patient. The relief I get from 30 min on the mat is about 80%. However, the relief only lasts for 2-3 hours. This is similar to needle acupuncture treatments that I have received.
customer_reviews.author: Russell M.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend as a gift. He loves it. He says sometimes he gets so comfy on it falls asleep. He said it does help with his chronic lower back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Winning!
customer_reviews.text: I had low expectations. Didn’t expect a pokey mat to help with any of my issues, but man I was mistaken. This this is wonderful. You can spend a lot more money on one, but if this is your first and have never experienced it before- do yourself a favor and get this to start. The expensive one will always be there.
customer_reviews.author: marshall

customer_reviews.title: This mat works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed at the quick and lasting relief I got. My lower back was guide painful after a 12 mile hike. After laying on the mat and pillow for15 minutes, the pain was gone.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for issues he was having for his back and he loves it. He has used it a few times now and says each time he likes it more and more. So glad I bought this for him! I have used it as well for headaches, it’s a little painful the first time you use it but after a few minutes it eases the pain away. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenavie Emma

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing in an odd sort of way
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but haven’t had it long enough to judge how well it works long term. I’m still on 10 to 15 minutes time. It is prickly but I’m able to relax on it, and feel somewhat better for it.
customer_reviews.author: Largoann

customer_reviews.title: Helps with back pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help the muscles in my back. It does help, most days enough to keep from taking otc pain meds. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Helps my Back
customer_reviews.text: Pain. I use this for 15 minutes along with physical therapy & anti inflammatory as needed m, for very effective pain relief. It’s really not that uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.author: NaturalHealth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today & I’m already hooked! Very relaxing. I was able to get used to lying on it pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Wickham

customer_reviews.title: Best amazon purchase to date
customer_reviews.text: If you suffer from chronic lower back pain, this will do miracles for you. I have back pain from working out that bothers me. I started to use this and this made the pain go away. No more headaches with the lower back. Thank God!
customer_reviews.author: Aristotle07

customer_reviews.title: Provides relief for migraines!
customer_reviews.text: The pillow does help my headaches. The pad didn't give me in significant relief. I have fibromyalgia. It isn't painful and actually comfortable onc er acclimating to it.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: The pillow was very comfortable, but I didn't feel like I got any benefit from the mat at all, and probably not from the pillow either.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night I have a back ache, headache or feel less than great (so most nights...). It really seems to relieve my aches & pains and work out the kinks.
customer_reviews.author: suziQ

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this the first time I used it. It’s incredibly relaxing, and I’ve fallen asleep on it a few times. I’ve told several people to order one!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good for relaxing
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used the mat, I didn’t feel any difference; however, the next time I just stayedl on it longer, and I felt much better when I got up. I was hoping that I could get some relief for my hips, but the points aren’t long enough, or thick enough to be able to penetrate the muscles to give relief.
customer_reviews.author: Cc-camper

customer_reviews.title: Missing a pouch for storage but it’s really good.
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. Does not really hurt to lay on it, come on people. The only reason that I am giving a 4 star is because I think it needs to come with a pouch to store it. Also, I don’t understand why it has 2 fabric hooks on the side. Can’t figure out what they are for.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A. Kryzanowski

customer_reviews.title: Helps with back pain.
customer_reviews.text: Like this product very much so far only have had for 2 weeks but it has been helpful with my back pain. I use it first thing in the morning to help me wake up by standing on it for only a few minutes feels great.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Headache Relief
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome for migraines and tension headaches. It kinda sucks that the pillow isn't attached and it won't stay rolled up, but I'd say it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Smith

customer_reviews.title: So relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this. Used when pregnant and when not, It takes a while to get used to but after using every night for a while, I can say it helps so much with relaxation and getting comfortable before bed. It’s a little bit painful when you first lay down but as your back relaxes into the spikes and circulation gets going it’s a great feeling. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: M. R.

customer_reviews.title: got up and was jumping around laughing because I felt so good. 😁😁 may be painful to some people because ...
customer_reviews.text: I have constant lower back pain, first time I layed on it 15 minutes, got up and was jumping around laughing because I felt so good. 😁😁 may be painful to some people because the points are very firm but for me it hurt so good
customer_reviews.author: donnie couch

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: It took a few tries until I felt that this really did work. I look forward to using it before I go to bed -- it relaxes my back almost instantly. It took a little while to get used to the "spikes" - but once you're used to the feeling, it doesn't hurt. I would recommend this product. Not crazy about the pillow, but I like the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable then it looks
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had much of a chance to use this product yet but so far so good. So far I have only used it twice about an hour before going to bed and I did notice I seemed to be more relaxed. I look forward to trying out the mat more and I believe this is truly a good product to have in every home
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Gallia

customer_reviews.title: Relieved pain
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several for my friends already. Haven’t used it for long enough but I do feel improvement on my shoulder pain.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie Fong

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: It works just fine but compared to other mats the quality is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Everett

customer_reviews.title: lightweight, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I don't have complaints of pain, but tried using it after working out in the gym. Liked the mat a lot, felt very good on the back, but didn't like the neck pillow. Does seem to help relax muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Shirl

customer_reviews.title: plan to use frequently
customer_reviews.text: it takes a little getting used to , but ends up being kind of comfortable. helps with circulation and is relaxing
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I was getting headaches and neck pain all the time and I tried this for two days and I have no headache at all. For best use of this item would be without a shirt to get direct relief also laying flat on the floor would be a better option to make it work well.
customer_reviews.author: megha patel

customer_reviews.title: A very nice way to relax and relieve some aches and pains
customer_reviews.text: It does make you feel more relaxed! And, it doesn't require a long time to get the effects. In a few minutes there is a feeling of relief from an aching back, and an overall sense of comfort. It does take a few times to get used to the mat before you can enjoy its benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Old Sparkie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the size of product.
customer_reviews.text: Not very big. Fits barely a back. I am petite and expected a longer product. Was disappointed to find how short it was.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine71

customer_reviews.title: Must buy item for self-care!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing at an amazing price!! I’ve used it almost every day since purchasing it and it calms and soothes me at night before going to bed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonders
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer, helps with my stress, anxiety and migraines.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Marroquin

customer_reviews.title: nice to lie on, but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: nice to lie on, but overpriced. It is pretty much just some cheap foam and plastic glued together.
customer_reviews.author: kianna Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Takes some time to get used to but works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Koch

customer_reviews.title: No co-pay home therapy
customer_reviews.text: Works great for pain relief both in my shoulder and lower back. I do some of my core exercises while laying on it, really seems to increase their effects.
customer_reviews.author: hi?

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ended up taking this to the goodwill. This did nothing at all for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool thing
customer_reviews.text: Good for back/neck pain. My husband was skeptical but I find him using it often.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Wilfong

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It helps relieve back, hip and leg pain. The pillow is great for neck and head pain. I highly recommend this to add to your self care repertoire.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hennessy

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea that I needed this until I got it. This has improved my sleep and relieved back pain, I can not recommend this enough! So relaxing and I feel completely rejuvenated after using it
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Wilbert

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: Yup this really works. Helps with my lower back pain and so far I’m 3/3 on a good night sleep which is beyond rare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I instantly feel more relaxed when I lay on this. Its not painful at all
customer_reviews.author: Christiana Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Has not helped my back . Wish I could say that it worked!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl R.

customer_reviews.title: It simply works.
customer_reviews.text: Its a simple yet effective product and at a Very very reasonable price compared to other sellers. I can't recommend this mat enough. It has helped me greatly with many back issues and stress. Thank youuu!
customer_reviews.author: Insufficientfare

product_meta.title: Sivan Back and Neck Pain Relief Acupressure Mat and Pillow Set, Chronic Back Pain Treatment - Relieves Your Stress of Lower Upper Back and Sciatic Pain - Green
feature_bullets: ACUPRESSURE MASSAGE MAT AND NECK PILLOW (GREEN) — Provides thousands of stimulation points, for immediate back pain relief it also improves sleep, relieves stress, aches, pains, muscle tension, Blood Circulation and energy levels
GREAT FOR HEALING —The mat and pillow is a Swedish acupressure mat, inspired by ancient Indian healing tradition

HARMLESS — Believed to have been around for thousands of years, today it is "re-invented" in a modern form, with thousands of non-toxic plastic spikes, harmless to the skin but with all the healing benefits of its legendary ancestor

EASES TENSION — While triggering the body's innate way of healing itself, the thousands of acupressure points make the Mat and Pillow a very effective tool for easing tension and inducing a state of deep relaxation, while revitalizing and rejuvenating
100% NON-TOXIC PLASTIC NAILS — Hand washable removable cover — Measures 15.98" L x 12.76" W x 1.73" H
